arts.ttl: Fenerbahce come out fighting for Mourinho as Everton links continue to swirl
arts.sum: Fenerbahce have publically backed Jose Mourinho and called out criticism from commentator Ertem Şener as the Portuguese manager continues to be linked with Everton. The Turkish club posted on their account on X today with a ‘mandatory disclosure’ in which they called out Ertem Şener’s recent comments on Mourinho. The Portuguese coach has found himself The post Fenerbahce come out fighting for Mourinho as Everton links continue to swirl appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours today: Jaden Philogene to Ipswich, Enzo Le Fee to Sunderland, Diego Carlos to Fenerbahce
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Jaden Philogene to Ipswich, Enzo Le Fee to Sunderland and Diego Carlos to Fenerbahce.

arts.ttl: Fenerbahce confident of reaching an agreement with Aston Villa to sign Diego Carlos - with Unai Emery's side working on deal for another defender
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: Mail Sport reported on Monday how Jose Mourinho's side were hoping to finalise a £10million deal for the 31-year old centre back who has just 18 months left on contract.
